Sorry, I thought I replied. Gotta type quick and get to class.

::Slayer::

Slayer puts his hands up to his ears, covering them and flying 
backwards as the howl reaches him.

His shoulder blasters firing at Lunarpine, their aim a bit bad, 
Slayer roars, trying to drown out the sound.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OOC Yanshosh did you forget about this battle or do  you have to 
many

at him

wolfbots

Slayer. He
> > knew his howl couldn't cause any lasting damage but it could 
disrupt his

claws.

hopefully his

traitor

enough to

fought with

fighting was the

learn that

Slayer was
